content.raw: Just a further note with more experimentation over the weekend.  I'm seeing odd behavior with checkpoint jumping, and I don't know that it's fair to blame it on this patch.  That is, I find that if I start world 3, and then jump to checkpoint 4, things often go wonky.  I'll get crashes, errors in the console, and the behavior I've reported here.  If, instead, I start checkpoint 2, then 3, and then go to 4, and I get rational behavior (and I even get credit for picking up the leak detector).
content.html: Just a further note with more experimentation over the weekend. I'm seeing odd behavior with checkpoint jumping, and I don't know that it's fair to blame it on this patch. That is, I find that if I start world 3, and then jump to checkpoint 4, things often go wonky. I'll get crashes, errors in the console, and the behavior I've reported here. If, instead, I start checkpoint 2, then 3, and then go to 4, and I get rational behavior (and I even get credit for picking up the leak detector).
